images.description: SDSS image of region near lenticular galaxy NGC 7335, also showing the pairs of stars listed as NGC 7326, NGC 7333 and NGC 7338, and galaxies NGC 7331, NGC 7335, NGC 7336, NGC 7337 and NGC 7340
